mapper.select: SELECT R.NO REVIEW_NO , M.NICK MEMBER_NICK , M.PROFILE_IMG MEMBER_PROFILE ,TO_CHAR(R.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY. MM. DD. HH24:MI') ENROLL_DATE , R.CONTENT FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.WRITER_NO = M.NO WHERE R.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND R.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY 4 DESC, 1 DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(NO, WRITER_NO, BOARD_NO, CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL, #{writerNo}, #{boardNo}, #{content})
